short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically tune into the live streams of your favorite streamers on Twitch and Kick.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: My Favorite Streamers keeps you effortlessly connected with your favorite Twitch and Kick streamers. This extension allows you to add streamers and manage your stream list with just a few clicks. Whether you prefer a one-time alert or daily reminders, My Favorite Streamers ensures you never miss your favorite content. Enjoy an easy-to-use interface that helps you keep track of your "Favorite Streamers" automatically.
